## NodeCanvasRenderingContext2D class

A limited Node implementation for DOM CanvasRenderingContext2D.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class NodeCanvasRenderingContext2D implements ICanvasRenderingContext2D 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(canvas)](./canvas-cleave.nodecanvasrenderingcontext2d._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>NodeCanvasRenderingContext2D</code> class |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [canvas](./canvas-cleave.nodecanvasrenderingcontext2d.canvas.md) |  | <code>NINodeCanvas</code> | Reference to the canvas that this rendering context is for. |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [createImageData(data)](./canvas-cleave.nodecanvasrenderingcontext2d.createimagedata.md) |  | Create empty ImageData with dimensions copied from provided ImageData. |
|  [createImageData(width, height)](./canvas-cleave.nodecanvasrenderingcontext2d.createimagedata_1.md) |  | Create empty ImageData with the provided dimensions. |
|  [drawImage(image, dx, dy)](./canvas-cleave.nodecanvasrenderingcontext2d.drawimage.md) |  | Draw an image to the canvas at the specified coordinates. |
|  [drawImage(image, sx, sy, sw, sh, dx, dy, dw, dh)](./canvas-cleave.nodecanvasrenderingcontext2d.drawimage_1.md) |  | Draw a region of an image to the canvas at the specified coordinates. |
|  [getImageData(sx, sy, sw, sh)](./canvas-cleave.nodecanvasrenderingcontext2d.getimagedata.md) |  | Get ImageData for the defined region of the canvas. |
|  [putImageData(imageData, dx, dy)](./canvas-cleave.nodecanvasrenderingcontext2d.putimagedata.md) |  | Replace a region of the canvas with the supplied ImageData. |
|  [putImageData(imageData, dx, dy, dirtyX, dirtyY, dirtyWidth, dirtyHeight)](./canvas-cleave.nodecanvasrenderingcontext2d.putimagedata_1.md) |  | Replace a region of the canvas with a region of the supplied ImageData. |
